column4: Hello, when i use CTRL+ALT+F1 to open the ttyÂ¨s the only thing i see, is a blinking line :(
try alt+left or alt+right to cycle through the allocated ttys. If none is there, check /etc/init/. ttys are defined there
they are there, but it seems that nothing will happen on them, only the blinking line :(
check  i.e. /etc/init/tty1 whether a "getty" is actually spawned there
